attributes.action: Classify Ice Skating as a Recognised Sport & allow Ice Rinks to Re-Open
attributes.additional_details:
They do not just train on the ice, they have a whole team behind them; from strength and conditioning to flexibility classes - yet they still can't be classed as a sport! 
This is not a leisurely activity, please help them get back on the ice and get the recognition the sport deserves!
#sportnotlesuire British Ice Skating
attributes.background: A 5-year-old little girl had a dream and fell in love with the ice, nearly 20 years later she is still training 5/6 days a week alongside hundreds of other athletes, waking up a 5am, putting their blood, sweat and tears into this sport, week in and week out - They don’t give up.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562174

This petition was initially incorrectly rejected as being unclear.
